content: आरोपणं {@--1@} Placing or fixing in or upon, putting; आर्द्राक्षतारोपणमन्वभूतां <ls>R. 7. 28</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 88</ls>; (<ab>fig.</ab>) establishing, installing; अधिकारारोपणं <ls>Mu. 3.</ls> {@--2@} Causing to mount or ascend, raising (to heaven). {@--3@} Planting. {@--4@} The stringing of a bow. {@--5@} Trusting, delivering.
